about_the_game:
A few months into the war with the United Bunny Federation, the Galactic Foxian Empire had a stroke of luck. Imperial spies have located Mochi Prime, the Federation home world, and learned that the fleet defending it is currently away. Sensing an opportunity for an early victory, Foxian High Command plans an invasion of Mochi Prime to destroy the Federation's chain of command.

The Battle of Mochi Prime... is about to begin.

This side story takes place between Chapter 2 and Chapter 3 of the Space Fox Kimi base game.



Arrow keys to move/select
Z to interact/confirm
X for menu/go back
Hold SHIFT to run

Tip: You can save anywhere from the menu. It's recommended that you save often and in different save slots!

Additional Credits:
姫HimeWorks for Plugins

name: Space Fox Kimi - The Battle of Mochi Prime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A stroke of luck, a once in a lifetime chance to end the war. The fleet gathers in preparation for an invasion. The Battle of Mochi Prime... is about to begin.
